# Define some default values that can be overridden by system properties log4j.rootLogger=INFO,stdout log4j.threshhold=ALL log4j.appender.stdout=org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender log4j.appender.stdout.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
